features.title: Note Numbering
features.description: Allow for optional numbering of notes for easier reference and practice.

features.title: Note Coloring
features.description: Allow user to toggle note colors for easier distinction and practice.

features.title: Note Notes
features.description: Allow user to add notes referance by note number.

features.title: Note tooltip select
features.description: Add Practice Overlays Checkbox to enable/disable note tooltip feature.

features.title: Note tooltip
features.description: Optionally show note Practice Overlays via tooltip on hover.

features.title: Practice Passage Support Infrastructure
features.description: Create passages.json data structure, implement passage loading and selection functionality, add passage upload page, and integrate passage rendering with existing VexFlow notation system. Includes octave transposition controls specific to passage mode.

features.title: Enhanced Playback Controls Integration
features.description: Integrate full playback functionality from play-scales.html into the new wireframe UI including play/pause/restart/rewind/loop controls, tempo slider, current note highlighting, and synchronized audio-visual feedback.

features.title: URL Parameter Scale Selection for show-scales.html
features.description: Allow optional URL parameter to set the scale (e.g., Cmaj or Aminor) while preserving all other defaults from cookies. Example: show-scales.html?scale=Cmaj or show-scales.html?scale=Aminor

features.title: Copy Play functionality from play-scales.html to show-scales.html
features.description: Add audio playback capabilities to the show-scales page by integrating the play functionality currently available in play-scales.html

features.title: Interactive Fingering Chart
features.description: Tap any note to reveal correct euphonium fingering with visual feedback and valve animation.

features.title: Audio Feedback with Tone.js
features.description: Capture and playback user input to assess pitch accuracy and tonal quality in real time.

features.title: Progress Tracker
features.description: Track practice streaks, session duration, and improvement metrics with visual charts.

features.title: User Login
features.description: User Login page which would facilitate server-side user data storage such as User uploads .mxl → Netlify Function extracts & parses → Save .json to Netlify Blobs → Serve to frontend

features.title: Onboarding Flow with Video Tutorials
features.description: Step-by-step onboarding using curated videos and interactive guidance for new users.

features.title: SpeechSynthesis Integration
features.description: Enable spoken instructions and feedback using browser-native speech synthesis.

features.title: getUserMedia Microphone Input
features.description: Allow live audio capture for pitch detection and real-time feedback.

features.title: Modular Extension Tracker
features.description: Display installed and planned modules with status indicators and versioning.

features.title: MusicTutor.Studio Domain Integration
features.description: Successfully migrated site to MusicTutor.Studio domain. All URLs and deployment scripts updated to use new domain infrastructure.

features.title: Allow user to name and save current formatted scale or passage for subsequent retrieval or to be added to lesson plan
features.description: Implement functionality to allow users to save their currently configured scales or practice passages with custom names. Saved items can be retrieved later for practice or incorporated into structured lesson plans for organized learning progression.
